Date: Friday, 1/31/1984
Subject: Your offer sounds good
I have to admit that I like your offer.
So far, it's the best one I've received.

Regards,
Jose Ramirez



Date: Tuesday, 2/4/1984
Subject: Thank you, I'll sign!
Your contract offer is really what I'm looking for.
I'm looking forward to playing with West Texas!

Regards,
Jose Ramirez



Date: Friday, 2/7/1984

Dear Sir,

C Shane Mondy, SP John Green
in return for
CF Wilson Macias.

Please let me know if you accept!

Best Regards,
New Jersey GM

Date: Friday, 4/4/1984
Subject: Terrance Charles failed learning new position
Terrance Charles doesn't seem to make
any progress learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director

Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Progress of Scotty Knight
Dear Sir,
Scotty Knight has nothing more to prove at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
He has an AVG of .439 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1984
Subject: Status of Terrance Charles
Dear Sir,
Terrance Charles isn't hitting the ball at all at AA Lake Minnetonka Vessels!
He has an AVG of .202, so a demotion is
the right choice. He shouldn't be emberassed any more.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: My role in this team
Sir,

elsewhere!

Regards,
Allen Lent
